mapper.select: SELECT id, "name" AS name, passport_number, nationality, gender, birthdate, email, created_at FROM public.tourists WHERE passport_number = #{passportNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.tourists ( "name", passport_number, nationality, gender, birthdate, email ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{passportNumber}, #{nationality}, #{gender}, #{birthdate}, #{email} )
mapper.update: UPDATE public.tourists SET "name" = #{name}, nationality = #{nationality}, gender = #{gender}, birthdate = #{birthdate}, email = #{email} WHERE id = #{id}
